discourse_list.title: EIP-2280: erc-20 extension for native meta transactions support

content.content: Hey Magicians, I published a draft for an interface to add native meta transactions to ERC-20 tokens, and also support EIP-712 and ERC-165. I also provided a complete implementation and set of tools to use the protocol. The implementation is here: GitHub - ticket721/mTKN And here is the initial draft: EIPs/eip-2280.md at feat/mtkn-proposal · mortimr/EIPs · GitHub I’d love to discuss it and make this interface one of the first “meta-extension” of a famous standard (an important step if we want to build Relay Networks (Meta Miners !)). Thank you for reading
